channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Central management Console)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Central management Console)

item.title: CVE-2022-35228|2024-08-03T09:29:17.463Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28central%20management%20console%29
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects CMC allows an unauthenticated attacker to retrieve token information over the network which would otherwise be restricted. This can be achieved only when a legitimate user accesses the application and a local compromise occurs, like sniffing or social engineering. On successful exploitation, the attacker can completely compromise the application.
